verses.name: Daniel 2:13
verses.text: And the decree went forth that the wise men should be slain; and they sought Daniel and his fellows to be slain.

verses.name: Daniel 2:14
verses.text: Then Daniel answered with counsel and wisdom to Arioch the captain of the king’s guard, which was gone forth to slay the wise men of Babylon:

verses.name: Daniel 2:15
verses.text: He answered and said to Arioch the king’s captain, Why is the decree so hasty from the king? Then Arioch made the thing known to Daniel.

verses.name: Daniel 2:16
verses.text: Then Daniel went in, and desired of the king that he would give him time, and that he would shew the king the interpretation.
